name: The Best Builder
description:
movement - WASD

In the battle you make a body, then you CAN add attachments or buy extra shots. You shoot with the shoot button, causing you to deal the damage amount * the among of shots you have. Heal gives you hp, and is free. While ULT heal, gives you 5 hp, for the price of $15.

Sry, but this is my first completed game.
